title: ‘Dubai’ Premiere and ‘Beverly Hills’ Episode 4
description:
Rachel and Callie kick off the show with a chat about the twists and turns of this week’s wild Bravo news (1:25), before moving on to chat about the premiere of ‘The Real Housewives of Dubai’ (24:00). Then, Rachel is joined by Amelia and Jodi to break down Episode 4 of ‘The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills’ (45:41).
Host: Rachel Lindsay
Guests: Amelia Wedemeyer, Jodi Walker, and Callie Curry
Producers: Devon Manze and Chelsea Stark-Jones
Theme Song: Devon Renaldo
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
